<title level="1" right="Trait">[Rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=680)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 75 <sup>1.1</sup>

You must be [raging](/Actions.aspx?ID=2802) to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
